# Eric Grill - ericgrill.com

## About
Eric Grill is a builder, pilot, and Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu practitioner. He writes about AI, aviation, jiu jitsu, blockchain, and programming. He is the CEO of Chainbytes (Bitcoin ATM infrastructure) and has been in the Bitcoin space since 2013.

## Content Focus
- AI and Claude Code development (plugins, agents, skills, hooks)
- Bitcoin and blockchain infrastructure
- Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu competition and training
- Aviation and flying
- Software development and programming

## Main Sections
- / - Homepage with latest posts and bio
- /blog - Field notes and technical articles
- /about - Background, experience, and credentials
- /now - Current projects and focus areas
- /contact - Ways to connect

## Author
Name: Eric Grill
Twitter: @EricGrill
YouTube: @EricGrill
GitHub: EricGrill

## Technical Stack
Built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS.
